name: C.H.A.D - Crazy Hungry Awesome Dragonfly!
description:
This is a game I made to test out a boss idea I had. I wanted to mess around with a frog boss that would go in my own game, so I did this jam! You play as a hungry dragonfly so you have to eat....cheese?!? Enjoy :>

Controls: Left Click (or tap on mobile) to launch yourself in the direction you are rotated!
